titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Joe Sitter Collection of Fine Printing, 1976-2015 and undated RL.11211
titlestmt.author: Meghan Lyon

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2016-07-08 09:00:45 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Joe Sitter collection of fine printing
did.abstract: Joe Sitter's collection of fine printing specimens and broadsides, as well as his subject files on various presses and artists.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged into 2 series: Fine Printing and Subject Files.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Joe Sitter Collection of Fine Printing was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift and purchase in 2016.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Joe Sitter Collection of Fine Printing, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2016-0036

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: The Rubenstein Library also holds the Joe Sitter Collection of Gaylord Schanelic.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Broadsides, prints, and prospectuses from various fine press printers and artists; as well as subject files created by Sitter about various fine press printers and artists. Presses represented include The Whittington Press, Shanty Bay Press, Solmentes Press, and Ian Mortimer. Artists and printers represented are John Randle, Walter Bachinski, David Esselmont, Russell Maret, Howard Phipps, Miriam Macgregor, Hellmuth Weissenborn, and Judy Ling Wong.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes broadsides, prints, and prospectuses from various presses and artists collected by Joe Sitter. Some are numbered and signed by the artist. Illustrations are noted when identified.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Joe Sitter's Subject Files include an array of materials, including correspondence, from various presses and artists. The files were assembled by Sitter and also include original prints, prospectuses, and catalogs from some of the presses and artists. There are some duplicative materials between the Subject Files and the Fine Printing series.

did.unittitle: The Whittington Press: Correspondence, including with John Randle
